name: Double Headed Serpent Gold Chain
description:
#001 - Prehispanic Bling Bling Collection
The double-headed snake sculpture on which these are based came from Aztecs in Mexico representing the earth and the underworld with each head. The snake features strongly in the gods that the people worshiped.
These jewels will be part of a big unravelling roadmap that opens up a whole world of  prehispanic mesoamerican civilizations, their traditions and culture. I will create more pieces embracing these cultures as well as reinterpreting them with a hype urban style.
2048x2048 pixels resolution / 41 sec looping video / 53MB / MP4 file
